survey_name: Subscription-Based Fitness App User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on subscription-based fitness apps to understand satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based fitness apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based fitness apps?

questions.question_text: Which features do you value most in a fitness app? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who use fitness apps at least once a week.
